scripts.build: rm -Rf ./build && babel ./src -d ./build && cp src/config.json build/ && cp -r src/templates build/ && cp -r src/public/css  build/public/css && cp -r src/public/fonts  build/public/fonts && cp -r src/public/images  build/public/images && mkdir  build/pdf/
scripts.coverage: npm run buildAll && rm -Rf ./coverage && istanbul cover _mocha ./tmp/test/unit/ -- --recursive ./tmp/test/unit && remap-istanbul -i ./coverage/coverage.json -o ./coverage/lcov-report -t html&& remap-istanbul -i ./coverage/coverage.json -o ./coverage/coverage.json  && istanbul check-coverage ./coverage/coverage.json --statements=80 --functions=80 --branches=80 --lines=80
scripts.dist: npm run build && rm -Rf dist && mkdir -p dist && mv build dist && date +%s > dist/build_id && cp package.json dist && cd dist && npm i --production && cd .. && tar -zcf ./deploy.tar.gz -C ./dist/ . && rm -Rf dist/* && mv ./deploy.tar.gz dist
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unittest
